**Example 1: 修改实例ID**



Input: 

```
tccli waf ModifyObject --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ObjectId abc \
    --Status 0 \
    --InstanceId abc \
    --OpType abc \
    --Proxy 1 \
    --IpHeaders abc
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "eac6b301-a322-493a-8e36-83b295459397"
    }
}
```
